title: Was a ‘Trump Does the Unthinkable’ Op-Ed Written by Liz Crokin?
subtitle: An opinion piece by Liz Crokin supposedly recounting the various good deeds Trump performed before his presidency contains a mixture of truth and fiction.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: An opinion piece entitled "Trump Does the Unthinkable" was penned by a woman named Liz Crokin.
